statements: SELECT * FROM pharmacy_products;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmacy_products;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, stored_location FROM pharmacy_products ORDER BY stored_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmacy_products WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, stored_location FROM pharmacy_products WHERE stored_location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_products ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stored_location FROM pharmacy_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%pain%' AND stored_location IN ('Shelf 1', 'Shelf 2') ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.standard_name FROM pharmaceutical_products p INNER JOIN compliance_standards c ON p.id = c.id WHERE c.description LIKE '%safe%' ORDER BY p.product_name;
SELECT id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date <= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM Pharmaceutical_Products;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM Product_Categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT expiration_date, product_name FROM Pharmaceutical_Products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharma';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM Pharmaceutical_Products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM Pharmaceutical_Products ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM Pharmaceutical_Products p JOIN Product_Categories c ON p.id = c.category_id;
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, i.location FROM Pharmaceutical_Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE i.quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location FROM manufacturers;
SELECT dc_name, location FROM distribution_centers;
SELECT product_id, shipment_date FROM product_shipments;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM products JOIN manufacturers ON products.product_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id;

SELECT products.product_name, distribution_centers.dc_name, product_shipments.quantity FROM products JOIN product_shipments ON products.product_id = product_shipments.product_id JOIN distribution_centers ON product_shipments.dc_id = distribution_centers.dc_id;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id IN (SELECT manufacturer_id FROM products WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31');
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT id, product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_batches WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM product_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%medicine%';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM pharmaceutical_products GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM pharmaceutical_products p JOIN product_categories c ON p.id = c.category_id;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
